mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ORDER"(ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, ORDER_NAME, PHONE, PRICE, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, REQUEST, PAY_TID, PAY_METHOD) VALUES(SEQ_ONO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{orderName}, #{phone}, #{price}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{request}, #{payTid}, #{payMethod})
mapper.select: SELECT CART_NO, C.GOOD_NO, CHANGE_NAME, GOOD_TITLE, "COUNT", PRICE FROM CART C JOIN GOODS G ON C.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO LEFT JOIN GOODS_FILE F ON (G.GOOD_NO = F.SELL_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND STATUS = 'N' AND G.STOCK > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_GOODS(ORDER_DETAIL_NO, ORDER_NO, GOOD_NO, "COUNT", PRICE) VALUES(SEQ_OGNO.NEXTVAL, #{orderNo}, #{goodNo}, #{count}, #{price})
